AngelBisonInspection: Angel snorts at you. Any dreams you had of being a cowherd, free on the open range, are swiftly reconsidered.
CarrieBisonInspection: Carrie gazes at you, then lovingly whacks you with her tail. Ow.
DollyBisonInspection: Dolly sidles up to you for scritches. Her fur is impressively fluffy.
RebaBisonInspection: Reba nuzzles you for scritches. Her fur is very fluffy.
